author: newsr.in
title: Meet Pocket Programming: An app for learning to code via your Android phone
text: (By Yuki Sato, The Bridge) – Japanese app developer duo Ffab0 (pronounced “fab zero”) recently launched the English edition of a mobile learning app focused on Ruby and Ruby on Rails, called Pocket Programming. Prior to this, the team released the Japanese version of the app in late August. I had a chance to speak with […] »
